str2: Abraham, progenitor of the Hebrew race. Of Hebrew origin; Abraham, the Hebrew patriarch.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From a variation of genos; to procreate; figuratively, to regenerate.
(Hebrew), Isaac, the patriarch. Of Hebrew origin; Isaac, the son of Abraham.
(Hebrew), Isaac, the patriarch. Of Hebrew origin; Isaac, the son of Abraham.

Of Hebrew origin; Judas, the name of ten Israelites; also of the posterity of one of them and its region.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A brother, member of the same religious community, especially a fellow-Christian. A brother near or remote.
